name: Super Stable Charger Robot
description:
Go through a maze while your parts turn off unpredictabily...did I say that?
Try out this perfectly stable charger-robot Model LD-4921
---
Controls:
wasd - move/look
space - interact
R - use remote control

Turn the sound on! Headphones recommended
---

This is a puzzle-platformer made for Ludum Dare 49 compo-style (1 person, 48hours). Theme: unstable
---
Enjoy! Please leave your feedback!
